title: Align response storage format with HTTPx raw HTTP format
description: probeHTTP's response storage diverges from HTTPx in 6 areas: directory layout (extra response/ subdir), no index.txt, hash includes method prefix, custom === SECTION === format instead of raw HTTP, redirect chain is summarized instead of full req/resp pairs, and final URL is in a section instead of bare last line. All 6 must match HTTPx so downstream tools consume either tool's output interchangeably.
